option.name: scriptParameters
option.value: -PappArgs="['-T AddAlleleInfo', '-p $USER_HOME$/Documents/tmp/wd_sure/pipeline_test_data/merge_with_barcodes/test_iPCR_sure51.raw.ipcr', '-g $USER_HOME$/Documents/tmp/wd_sure/pipeline_test_data/genotype_gvcfs/test_iPCR.merged.raw.snps.indels.g.vcf.gz', '-o $USER_HOME$/Documents/tmp/wd_sure/pipeline_test_data/merge_with_barcodes/test_alleles', '-r']"

option.name: scriptParameters
option.value: -PappArgs="['-T MergeBamWithBarcodes', '-i $USER_HOME$/Documents/tmp/wd_sure/pipeline_test_data/extract_target_regions/test_out.bam', '-b $USER_HOME$/Documents/tmp/wd_sure/pipeline_test_data/iPCR-trim/test_iPCR_sure51_forw.info', '-o $USER_HOME$/Documents/tmp/wd_sure/pipeline_test_data/merge_with_barcodes/test']"

task.summary: Started implementing annotating of reads with variant info
Fixed issue where the incorrect allele was shown for indels. Current implementation omits annotations where the variant alleles do not match to either ref or alt.
Added support for reduced output type

MESSAGE.value: Started implementing the merging of barcode info with alignment info. Implemented software tool in Java.
Implemented merging of BAM and barcode info file
Started implementing annotating of reads with variant info
Fixed issue where the incorrect allele was shown for indels. Current implementation omits annotations where the variant alleles do not match to either ref or alt.
Added support for reduced output type

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added support for reduced output type
